newsitem.title: JAPAN: Oyo forms unit for overseas operations.
newsitem.headline: Oyo forms unit for overseas operations.

text.p: Surveying firm Oyo Corp said on Tuesday that it had formed a unit in Japan to strengthen its research and consulting services overseas.

The new firm, capitalised at 300 million yen, would conduct surveys and geographical research and formulate development and infrastructure plans primarily in East Asia and Southeast Asia, Oyo said in a statement.
The new unit is expected to offer services in other parts of the world in the future, Oyo said.
